content.question: Respond to all parts of the question: (a) Using the data in the graph, describe a trend in life expectancy in China between 1990 and 2017. Explain a possible reason for this trend. (b) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about how cleavages affected life expectancy in China between 1990 and 2017. (c) Explain why life expectancy in China differs from life expectancy in the United Kingdom.

frqParts.text: Respond to all parts of the question: (a) Using the data in the graph, describe a trend in life expectancy in China between 1990 and 2017. Explain a possible reason for this trend. (b) Using the data in the graph and your knowledge of AP Comparative Government and Politics, draw a conclusion about how cleavages affected life expectancy in China between 1990 and 2017. (c) Explain why life expectancy in China differs from life expectancy in the United Kingdom.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Explain patterns and trends in data to draw conclusions.
